column4: hey I had a problem with my wireless connection, last time I connect to the wireless network but not connected to the internet
hey, I want to ask why I can't access the internet when I'n connected to my wireless network
hey, I want to ask why I can't access the internet when I'n connected to my wireless network
Mteck, yes I'll paste it for you http://paste.ubuntu.com/259499/
Mteck, I think that it had no internet activity when I'm connected
Mteck, I'm afraid that it might happen again.
Mteck, why a network doesn't emit any internet activity? Is it because too much computers are stealing the bandwith
Mteck, so had you found out any reason why?
Mteck, well today I restarted the computer 2 times maybe 3 and it doesn't help but then shut it down. Restarted it and so it worked how come?
it could have been a massive range of things - too hard to pinpoint without the issue being there
what happens if you dig google.com
then you're getting to the internet just fine...
it could have been a fluke it wasn't working - no reason to worry now
I'd have to have been there to investigate it
don't worry unless it happens again
Like I said - without it happening again, it's hard to track down
